long_description: Take your little one out for a spin and get a great workout with the Thule Jog Kit. It converts your Thule Chariot Cheetah 1 or Cheetah 1 Stroller (sold separately) into a running stroller. Thule Jog Kit includes a 16 in. quick-release wheel with lightweight aluminum arms. Attach the jogging arms to your stroller with the ezClick(TM) arms and you're off and running. Add the Thule Jogging Brake Kit (sold separately) for simple braking with an attached lever on the handlebar of your stroller.
short_description: Take your little one out for a spin and get a great workout with the Thule Jog Kit. It converts your Thule Chariot Cheetah 1 or Cheetah 1 Stroller (sold separately) into a running stroller.
